column1: Address entry during the ordering process is made faster and more convenient, while minimizing address input errors.
column2: Address entry during the ordering process is made faster and more convenient, while minimizing address input errors.

column1: DATAFACTORY AUTOCOMPLETE is easily integrated into your ordering process and conveniently assists during address entry using postal data based on the original Deutsche Post postal routing data.
column2: DATAFACTORY AUTOCOMPLETE is easily integrated into your ordering process and conveniently assists during address entry using postal data based on the original Deutsche Post postal routing data.

column1: If you do not have an account yet or your account is not enabled for DATAFACTORY AUTOCOMPLETE, please use the Deutsche Post Direkt website to use our address solutions.
column2: If you do not have an account yet or your account is not enabled for DATAFACTORY AUTOCOMPLETE, please use the Deutsche Post Direkt website to use our address solutions.

column1: More than 1.2 million different address suggestions are available, including all street names relevant for delivery, more than 16,000 postcodes with destinations, 14,000 cities, and 75,000 districts.
column2: More than 1.2 million different address suggestions are available, including all street names relevant for delivery, more than 16,000 postcodes with destinations, 14,000 cities, and 75,000 districts.

column1: Show an infobox on the street address field, if an address suggestion was selected to remind the customer of adding their house number.
column2: Show an infobox on the street address field, if an address suggestion was selected to remind the customer of adding their house number.

column1: Text displayed as infobox on street address field
column2: Text displayed as infobox on street address field

column1: The DATAFACTORY AUTOCOMPLETE from Deutsche Post Direkt offers effective support for address collection in online business.
column2: The DATAFACTORY AUTOCOMPLETE from Deutsche Post Direkt offers effective support for address collection in online business.

column1: You need a valid Deutsche Post Direkt account.
column2: You need a valid Deutsche Post Direkt account.

column1: Your customer receives up to 15 suggestions as soon as the first alphanumeric characters are entered in the input field.
